00018 BusIfGeneralTab::BusIfGeneralTab(LibraryInterface* libHandler, 
00019                                                                  void* dataPointer, 
00020                                                                  QWidget *parent): 
00021 QWidget(parent), busif_(static_cast<BusInterface*>(dataPointer)),
00022 nameGroup_(this, tr("Name and description")),
00023 attributes_(this),
00024 busType_(VLNV::BUSDEFINITION, libHandler, this, this),
00025 absType_(VLNV::ABSTRACTIONDEFINITION, libHandler, this, this),
00026 details_(dataPointer, this),
00027 libHandler_(libHandler) {
00028 
00029         Q_ASSERT_X(dataPointer, "BusIfGeneralTab constructor",
00030                 "Null dataPointer given as parameter");
00031         Q_ASSERT_X(libHandler, "BusIfGeneralTab constructor",
00032                 "Null LibraryInterface-pointer given as parameter");
00033 
00034         connect(&nameGroup_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00035                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00036         connect(&nameGroup_, SIGNAL(nameChanged(const QString&)),
00037                 this, SIGNAL(nameChanged(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00038         connect(&attributes_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00039                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00040         connect(&busType_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00041                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00042         connect(&absType_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00043                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00044 
00045         busType_.setTitle(tr("Bus definition"));
00046         absType_.setTitle(tr("Abstraction definition"));
00047 
00048         // create the layout of the general tab
00049         QGridLayout* layout = new QGridLayout(this);
00050         layout->addWidget(&nameGroup_, 0, 0, 1, 1);
00051         layout->addWidget(&attributes_, 0, 1, 3, 1);
00052         layout->addWidget(&busType_, 1, 0, 1, 1);
00053         layout->addWidget(&absType_, 2, 0, 1, 1);
00054         layout->addWidget(&details_, 3, 0, 1, 2);
00055 
00056         restoreChanges();
00057 }
00058 
00059 BusIfGeneralTab::~BusIfGeneralTab() {
00060 }
00061 
00062 bool BusIfGeneralTab::isValid() const {
00063         
00064         if (!nameGroup_.isValid())
00065                 return false;
00066         else if (!attributes_.isValid())
00067                 return false;
00068         else if (!busType_.isValid())
00069                 return false;
00070         
00071         // if specified bus type does not exist
00072         else if (!libHandler_->contains(busType_.getVLNV()))
00073                 return false;
00074 
00075         // if abstraction type is not empty but is not valid
00076         else if (!absType_.isEmpty() && !absType_.isValid())
00077                 return false;
00078 
00079         // if specified abstraction type does not exist
00080         else if (!absType_.isEmpty() && !libHandler_->contains(absType_.getVLNV()))
00081                 return false;
00082 
00083         else if (!details_.isValid())
00084                 return false;
00085 
00086         return true;
00087 }
00088 
00089 void BusIfGeneralTab::restoreChanges() {
00090 
00091         nameGroup_.setName(busif_->getName());
00092         nameGroup_.setDisplayName(busif_->getDisplayName());
00093         nameGroup_.setDescription(busif_->getDescription());
00094 
00095         attributes_.setAttributes(busif_->getAttributes());
00096 
00097         if (busif_->getBusType().isValid())
00098                 busType_.setVLNV(busif_->getBusType());
00099         
00100         if (busif_->getAbstractionType().isValid())
00101                 absType_.setVLNV(busif_->getAbstractionType());
00102 
00103         details_.restoreChanges();
00104 }
00105 
00106 void BusIfGeneralTab::applyChanges() {
00107 
00108         if (!isValid())
00109                 return;
00110 
00111         busif_->setName(nameGroup_.getName());
00112         busif_->setDisplayName(nameGroup_.getDisplayName());
00113         busif_->setDescription(nameGroup_.getDescription());
00114 
00115         busif_->setAttributes(attributes_.getAttributes());
00116 
00117         busif_->setBusType(busType_.getVLNV());
00118         
00119         // abstraction type is optional element and is set only if its valid
00120         if (!absType_.isEmpty())
00121                 busif_->setAbstractionType(absType_.getVLNV());
00122 
00123         details_.applyChanges();
00124 }
00125 
00126 VLNV BusIfGeneralTab::getBusType() const {
00127         return busType_.getVLNV();
00128 }
00129 
00130 VLNV BusIfGeneralTab::getAbsType() const {
00131         return absType_.getVLNV();
00132 }
